product_name: The North Face Allabout Rain Jacket - Women's
long_description: A stylish HyVent(R) rain shell, the mesh-lined, waterproof, breathable Allabout Rain Jacket from The North Face performs and looks great. HyVent 2-layer construction is fully seam sealed to keep moisture out. Mesh lining aids ventilation and adds comfort. Adjustable hood features a soft chin guard. Exposed center-front zipper is backed by a stormflap. Includes a media pocket; jacket stows in one of the zippered hand pockets. The North Face Allabout Rain Jacket features elastic cuffs and a drawcord hem to keep warmth in, wet weather out.
short_description: A stylish HyVent(R) rain shell, the mesh-lined, waterproof, breathable Allabout Rain Jacket from The North Face performs and looks great.
